misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values.
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom sr = new SecureRandom(new byte[]{seed});
int v = sr.nextInt();
description: The seed used to initialize the SecureRandom object is a single byte value, which is not sufficiently random.
recommendation: Generate a random and sufficiently long seed for initializing the SecureRandom object.
